Had a good time. Enjoyed seeing lots of familiar faces and some good  
swor=
ds. People are still submitting stuff they shouldn't, however. I  
do hope =
the level of study continues to improve. A lot of the guys  
who have been =
with this for some time now did very well with some  
only getting one or t=
wo rejections. Nonetheless, the younger and less  
experienced guys need so=
me guidance. I think the clubs are best for  
that. Still, when the front d=
esk tells you not to submit your  
numbered and stamped gunto and you do an=
yway, I guess there is not  
much that can be done. We are trying to have a=
 traveling shinsa every  
year with Chicago up next. I hope we can continue=
 to see fewer  
rejections. Oh, the show also seems to have been well atten=
ded on  
Saturday. I gave a short talk similar to the one in San Francisco,=
  
and it was a pretty good turn out for a one off event.

Gordon
